𓀄

𐂻 ≈ 𐙒 𐝤 𐜃 𐜄 𐜅 𐜆 hides

𐁇 in 𓂧 𓎛 𓂋 𓄛 •διθρί < 𐀇𐁇𐀨 di-pte-ra δίπτερα leather hide, pelt (>writing material)

𐎈 HOTA H+Y+T Häute : animal (hides)

𐂢 ≈ 𐂮𐘺 𐂮𓄜 𐂯𓄜 Linear-B Sign ideogram LB153 <> pelt haut hide skin 𐂡 𐃜 𐂣

𒄭𒇲 HI.la₂ cover (with hides) 𒄭𒇲 HI.la₂ heil- < καλύπτω kalúptō <> occulō

𓎛 𓂝 𓉐 house < hut < hide <> skin 𓄛 tent <> heissen
